website_summaries.verdict: This durable model’s pull-out drawers are a fantastic way to entertain and save space when the party’s over, and with so many styles available, it’s easy to find one you’ll appreciate.
pros: Includes a pair of built-in drawers for storing 4 serving utensils and additional snacks
cons: A little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Cheese Board. Charcuterie Board. It is very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a special birthday in our family. You know, one of those which end in "0"! I decided to try my hand at putting together a Charcuterie Board, Cheese Tray, Nibbles for the food table. This Bamboo Board was certainly the centerpiece of my table. What I liked---the indent on two of the corners to hold small bowls for mustard or mayo, the indents around the sides for crackers, etc. But my favorite part was the slide-out drawer with four utensils compatible with the theme. I thought the table looked nice. I learned a lot! And I am very glad I added this piece to my entertaining collection!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, needs quality control
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, it is functional and pretty. However, it isn't polished, and you run the risk of getting splinters every time you open the drawer, or touch the edges. Also, the two ceramic bowls are fragile, and the edges break off quickly. We have now had the product for less than three months, and it has cracked in two. This is most likely because I washed it after using it. Either way, the product has now fallen apart, and its two ceramic bowls have chipped. No heavy usage, just some happy hour snacks, but no longer useable. A good idea, but poorly executed.
customer_reviews.author: Bethesda Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great quality and love that everything is intact
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a bridal shower gift and even had it engraved. great quality and love that everything is intact. got so many compliments that i'll be ordering a couple for my own house.
customer_reviews.author: Addis Mom

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction guaranteed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my aunt. When I go to her house, she always serves cheese and crackers with different cheese dips, etc. so I figured this would be perfect. I saw her open it, and it looks great! Have not used it yet, but I’m sure she is looking forward to it. The seller/company seems to really care about their product and your satisfaction with it. I received a few follow up emails asking about how I liked the product and how to properly use and wash the board. They really want you to be happy with it! I would definitely recommend this particular brand/seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice classy gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice board. Good bamboo quality like it says. It comes with two small round sauce bawls, and it has a separate draw with cheese knives. I like how it has nice tray sides so you can stack crackers, cheese or whatever you like neatly, which was the whole purpose of me buying it. It definitely looks classy for parties or any events. I might by another one for my self. And yes, it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maya L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Housewarming Gift
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has a zillion cheese boards to sift through and it is worth your time to hunt. So many variations. This one was exactly what I needed and a good price. Well built, packed well so curved dishes and board arrived in perfect condition. Great house warming gift for a dear friend!
customer_reviews.author: R.Kimmel

customer_reviews.title: A Cheese Board with awesome looks, sturdy, good size and great value!
customer_reviews.text: This Cheese Board was exactly what we were looking to purchase. We will use this cheese board for small cheese, grapes, & wine parties in our home for house guests and friends. It attractive, just the correct size for us and very durable. It’s everything we expected from info on Amazon. We love ours!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Board but Packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: When I received the box it looked like someone had opened the entire thing, put it back together, and used packing tape to seal it up again. Wouldn't be something I'd want to turn over as a gift with the way it looks. Opening the box, everything was in a plastic wrap. It appears that the entire bamboo board and ceramic dishes are there, however at this time I don't want to open the shrink wrap because we are in the process of moving. From what I can see of the board it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jsimpson9813

customer_reviews.title: Made in China quality
customer_reviews.text: So, it looks nice when you pull it out of the box, but the chalk board doesn't fit into the allotted space--totally mismatched. Ruined my holiday entertaining plans, because who wants cheap junk on show with guests? Nothing worse than paying a premium price for Made in China quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Thomas

customer_reviews.title: High quality - multifunctional - excellent gift to yourself or others!
customer_reviews.text: This cheese board is the answer to one of my big entertaining problems - I never had the proper place to put crackers when I served cheese. This piece is ingenious. I also never need to worry about lost little cheese knifes in the kitchen drawer again! Classic bamboo, looks like wood, cleans easily. Quality, heavy piece. We put cheeses and grapes on top, crackers on three sides, pepperoni slices on the fourth side and mustards in the dishes. It's just perfect. Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Selective buyer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for an affordable, adorable cheese board, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I received my board in one day! I entertained the next day and recieved many compliments. I bought the one with the heart shaped bowls. It's adorable, functional and the drawer/knives are so very helpful. The board itself is good quality. I'm very pleased with this purchase. I plan on buying 2 more for holiday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Scar Larson

customer_reviews.title: B-day Gift for Wife
customer_reviews.text: She loves it! We do a lot of entertaining and we were missing something that was functional with the spread but also aesthetically pleasing. It’s a cool conversation piece as well.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first official cheeseboard as an adult and I love it. I’ve used it for two Thanksgiving parties now, it’s the perfect size and I LOVE the hidden utensil drawer. I had many compliments on it and can’t believe how affordable it was. As a side note, I remember the picture showing an engraving, but mine came blank, which was fine with me either way.
customer_reviews.author: chasema

customer_reviews.title: Great Engagement Party Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Our family members love entertaining with this and I think it made a really smart gift option instead of getting something that's just going to sit around collecting dust. I might even get one for us!
customer_reviews.author: alliecat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I returned my item as the slate piece did not fit, but I also changed my mind. Otherwise it was an adorable serving dish!
customer_reviews.author: K Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Very clever and useful.
customer_reviews.text: The cheese board is very nice due to the built in accessories and the slide out drawer. If I were to make one improvement, I would have one of the cracker slots rounded and one square; there are more square crackers than round ones. Board looks good and always gets a nice comment about it's functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Confidential

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Alot heavier than I was expecting, but it is a great idea for anyone who loves wine and cheese, or hosts alot of gatherings/parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Chic and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this cheese platter tucks the utensils inside the board! It makes it so easy to move the platter from place to place during a party and you always have all the "pieces" with you. :-) Great looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and quality cheese/cracker board
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and well worth the price. Good quality and loved the pull out sections and the included utensils.

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. The pullout drawer with the stored utensils is a great space saving idea. Lovely gift.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift but may keep it myself. Well made with lots of room for displaying various items. Fast delivery. I received it a few days sooner than expected. Will definitely purchase again if I need another housewarming gift.

customer_reviews.title: Received many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my tray! I like the size, the organized trays for crackers and the place for containers in the corners. It cleaned up nicely. I will use my own containers for the corners as these are small. I got many compliments the first time I used.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a anniversary gift for my husband and it is great!! Good quality, and perfect with the little ramekins for jam or nuts. Love it!!

customer_reviews.text: I had my first Wine and Cheese Party last Saturday, and thought hey, let me buy a Cheese Board. I was truly pleased with the cheese board that I purchased and would definitely recommend the board. I will probably get another one in the near future so that I can have a larger assortment of cheeses displayed.

customer_reviews.text: I am happy for the set of bamboo, is a great and elegant product. I got for my daughter wedding. I recommend highly

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter for Christmas, she absolutely loves it. It’s nice and sturdy, and the cheese knives can be stored in their own little drawer. This cheeseboard does it all, overall, it’s a solid investment for your entertaining needs.

customer_reviews.title: Great sized cheeseboard

customer_reviews.text: We bought it as a wedding gift for a 2nd marriage with well established home. The implement drawer is a nice way to keep them handy. It was sent direct, and as yet, have not heard back from the couple.

customer_reviews.title: It will make a great gift & someday I may even get one for myself

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!

customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for one get together with friends, but I would recommend it based on that. Love the little pullout drawer for knives. I would recommend purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I buy various bamboo cutting boards from different suppliers for my business. These are the only boards as of yet that I've ordered that are of great quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: This and That Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Hope she'll love it.
customer_reviews.text: One of the bowls was chipped. I contacted the seller & it was replaced promptly. This is going to be a house warming/Christmas hostess gift. Hope she'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Cracker wells also a great improvement over other serving boards
customer_reviews.text: Tonight was my first opportunity to entertain since I made this purchase. All of my guests were very impressed. The two ceramic cups were a profound benefit over charcuterie boards that do not have anything similar. Cracker wells also a great improvement over other serving boards. If the board was just three or four inches wider it would seem less crowded. Tight fit to serve Brie, Pate, and 2 cheeses. Absolutely very happy with the purchase. Super happy I purchased two to give one as a Christmas gift to my sister who is a professional caterer. She will love it
customer_reviews.author: Brian Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I don't even like cheese :)
customer_reviews.text: I love pretending to be fancy with this cheese board when I host. Looks great!

customer_reviews.title: My niece brought this beautiful cheeseboard out with a lovely cheese /fruit display
customer_reviews.text: My niece brought this beautiful cheeseboard out with a lovely cheese /fruit display. I liked it so much I bought myself and my daughter one. It’s solidly made with a “secret” drawer to keep all the utensils in and a grooved out area for crackers to fit in without sliding around.. the perfect size to make a light snack or appetizer for a crowd. I would definitely recommend this

product_meta.title: iBambooMart Slate Cheese Board Set w/Cutlery Set, 2 Bowl, Soap Stone Chalk, Bamboo Charcuterie Platter Wood Board, Perfect gift for Christmas, Mom, Mothers, Women, Men Housewarming, Wedding, Birthday
feature_bullets: ORGANIC BAMBOO cheese board includes slideout drawer with various slicing, spreading & serving knives set, it elegantly designed two round slot, which keeps the ramekin securely in place. two white 1.85"h ceramic bowl additionally gives extra features to serve sauces, nuts, olives and condiments. it has drip premium grooves that hold crackers, breads, dried meats and chips.

DRAWER Seamlessly pull out from the cheeseboard, it has slotted drawer storage block with accessories holder which is simply stunning and perfect to hold serving utensils and spreaders inside.stainless-steel blades comes with easy grip bamboo handle. it's non-slippery pads prevent from moving the charcuterie boards while opening the drawer or cutting cheese

ALL-NATURAL, ECO-FRIENDLY each of our modern wooden organic cheese boards and serving fork, tools are crafted with food safe, 100% quality bamboo. this makes them better for every food prep need from slicing cheese, chopping fruit, serve up appetizers,snack or making bread. it also works great as cheese plate set or wooden cheese serving set and can be used in any travel to the beach for a picnic. use the wide blade knife for thinly cutting hard cheese like asiago or parmesan.

BETTER FOOD PRESENTATION: our handmade bamboo wood cheese boards and knife set has conveniently edged kit for presenting crackers and breads. elegant grain finish and warm bambu color make it simply amazing. we happy to offer lifetime warranty if you do not love this product for any reason we will refund you your entire purchase. also be sure to pick up our large slate cheese cutting board set with knives set.

FANCY GIFT ideas for client, men, wife, wedding couple, engagement, friendship, mommy, mother's day, teacher husband, dad, father's day, bridal shower, groom, hostess, son, daughter, housewarming gifts for new home, birthday presents, anniversary, entertaining, thanksgiving, christmas holiday gifts. it's awesome presentation piece for family gatherings, wine parties & more. it surely go beyond your expectations. it's very practical, beautiful, useful & complete cheese party essentials tray.
